ch0183_00_molayne/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was looking
forward to running into you!
ch0183_00_molayne/0101_0701_02_10:
We’re sure to discover all kinds of new things as
we adventure on Pasio! Let’s give it our best!
ch0183_00_molayne/0601_0701_01_10:
Seems that Elite Four members from all over are
on Pasio, too.
ch0183_00_molayne/0601_0701_02_10: I’m still pretty new to Alola’s Elite Four.
ch0183_00_molayne/0601_0701_03_10:
So there’s a lot I could learn from battling and
talking with Elite Four members from other regions!
ch0183_00_molayne/0601_0701_04_10:
I’ve got to do what I can to keep up with the
other members of the Alola Elite Four.
ch0183_00_molayne/0605_0701_01_10:
You’ve got the same look in your eyes that Kukui
did when he was younger!
ch0183_00_molayne/0605_0701_02_10:
He never lost that sparkle in his eyes, whether he
was meeting Pokémon or doing anything else...
ch0183_00_molayne/0605_0701_03_10: Even now, I think he’s still chasing his dreams.
ch0183_00_molayne/0605_0701_04_10:
You should chase after your dreams, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0183_00_molayne/0605_0701_05_10:
I believe you’re a Trainer with enormous potential,
just like my best friend!
ch0183_00_molayne/1701_0701_01_10:
Perfect timing! I had something I wanted to give
to you.
ch0183_00_molayne/1701_0702_01_10: I’d be glad if that item were of use to you.
ch0183_00_molayne/2501_0701_01_10:
It’s been a while since I’ve walked around in a
new place and met so many new people. It’s a
nice feeling.
ch0183_00_molayne/2501_0701_02_10:
Now that I’m an adult, I’ve found a new thing to
look forward to—seeing you get stronger and
stronger!
ch0183_00_molayne/2501_0701_03_10:
When the memories I made adventuring as a kid
come back to me, I can’t help but feel warm
and fuzzy.
ch0183_00_molayne/2501_0701_04_10:
I hope the memories we make adventuring
together become just as precious to you.
ch0183_00_molayne/2501_0702_01_10:
A scientist’s duty is to better the world of
tomorrow, even if only a little.
ch0183_00_molayne/2501_0702_02_10:
Similarly, it’s my duty as a Trainer to help lead
you to a wonderful future.
ch0183_00_molayne/3001_0701_01_10:
I was observing the stars until the sun came up...
*yawn* I’m still super sleepy.
ch0183_00_molayne/3003_0701_01_10:
You might forget because we can’t see them,
but the stars are shining during the day, too.
ch0183_00_molayne/3005_0701_01_10:
You can occasionally see Minior fall from the
sky at night in Alola. You should come visit
and see them sometime.
